snippet.title: Shooting at Moscow court kills four
snippet.content: Moscow: Four people standing trial in a Moscow court have been killed in a gunfight that broke out in the court building, according to a lawyer for the defendants. The lawyer, Diana Tatosova, said she was told by the chief investigator in the case that of the 11 defendants in the court, four had been killed. TASS news agency said the gunfight broke out after some of the defendants had tried to grab firearms from court security officers and take hostages. More to come Reuters
